articles.content: Capital markets regulator Sebi has imposed a penalty totalling Rs 36 lakh on five entities -- including PGIM Asset Management Company and its chief executive officer Ajit Menon -- for flouting mutual… [+2023 chars]

articles.author: Gourav Mishra
articles.title: Websol Energy to Set Up a 1.8 GW Solar Cell and Module Manufacturing Plant - Mercom India
articles.description: Websol Energy System has approved the issue of 23,80,000 equity shares of ₹10 (~$0.126) each at an issue price of ₹105 (~$1.329).
articles.content:
Kolkata-based solar cells and modules manufacturer Websol Energy System has approved the issue of 23,80,000 equity shares of 10 (~$0.126) each at an issue price of 105 (~$1.329).

articles.content:
An arbitration tribunal, appointed by the Delhi High Court, on Thursday permitted Pawan Munjal-led to manufacture and sell electric vehicles under the trademark Hero.
